name: panada
content:
panada noun
(SAUCE OR SOUP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a type of soup, originally from some countries in western and southern Europe, made with bread: Patients were offered beef tea, mutton broth, chicken soup, or panada.
[ U ] a type of sauce or thick mixture made with milk and flour: The dumplings are made of seasoned ground fish or chicken, bound with panada or egg.

panada noun
(PASTRY)
[ C ] a fried dish from Indonesia consisting of a piece of pastry made with yeast, filled with a mixture that often includes meat or fish: We had panadas topped with cabbage and spicy onions.
[ C ] a baked dish from Sardinia consisting of pastry around a mixture such as meat and potatoes: Put the panada into a hot oven.
